subtitle: What fun these kebabs are for a firework night. Attach a foil tassel on the end and it could be made to look like a broom stick for Halloween!!!

method.text: Heat oil in a medium pan. Add onion and apples and cook for 2 min or until tender. Add baked beans and Worcestershire sauce and slowly bring to boil. Simmer for 5 min. Keep warm.
Cut sausages into 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm thick slices. Thread onto bamboo skewers with apples, yellow pepper and cherry tomatoes.
Mix mustard, soy sauce and honey together and brush all over the kebabs. Cook under medium grill for 10-12 min or until golden.

title: Bramley and sausage kebabs with bonfire beans
